import React from "react"; import OwlCarousel from "react-owl-carousel"; import ScreenHeading from "../../Utilities/ScreenHeading/ScreenHeading"; import ScrollService from "../../Utilities/ScrollService"; import Animations from "../../Utilities/Animations"; import "./Testimonials.css"; import "owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css"; import "owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css"; export default function Testimonial(props) { let fadeInScreenHandler = (screen) => { if (screen.fadeScreen !== props.id) return; Animations.animations.faceInScreen(props.id); }; const fadeInSubscription = ScrollService.currentScreenFadeIn.subscribe(fadeInScreenHandler); // Owl Carousel set up const options = { loop: true, margin: 0, nav: true, animateIn: "bounceInRight", animateOut: "bounceOutRight", dots: true, autoplay: true, smartSpeed: 1000, esponsive: { 0: { items: 1, }, 768: { items: 1, }, 1000: { items: 3, }, }, }; return (
{/* 1 */}
